title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: satin damasse with brocading in metal-wrapped silk; damasse (7&1 satin plus plain weave (grey) with discontinuous supplementary wefts (two metallics) bound on the front in 1/3 twill
creditline: Gift of L. Boyd and Annie McQuarrie Hatch
description: Blue-gray silk satin damasse with gold and silver metallic brocading. Vertical bands of delicate symmetrical floral decoration set off by narrow stripes, with vertical bands of floral designs in gold and silver brocading. Broad satin selvedges with pink and white stripes. Lined with red silk; edged with galloon of the period.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: satin damasse with brocading in metal-wrapped silk; damasse (7&1 satin plus plain weave (grey) with discontinuous supplementary wefts (two metallics) bound on the front in 1/3 twill. Gift of L. Boyd and Annie McQuarrie Hatch. 1955-25-1-a/d.
